text: I’m extremely disappointed with my recent order of chicken kebabs. The portion size was shockingly small, far less than what I’ve received in the past. For the price I paid, this is unacceptable and feels like a rip-off. The taste was decent, but the quantity left me frustrated and unsatisfied. If this is the new standard, I won’t be ordering again. It’s a shame to see a decline in both value and quality. I expect better from this establishment and urge them to reconsider their portion sizes if they want to keep loyal customers

Feedback to the management a few months ago about the smaller portion across all outlets and they really did take actions to improve the portion! Was pleasantly surprise today! Good job in listening to your customers and giving good value and healthy food! Thank you!

This was the worst experience I’ve ever had with this restaurant. I ordered a chicken kebab, but what I received was closer to a veggie kebab with a few pathetic scraps of chicken thrown in. The portion size was laughable, and for the price, it's an absolute scam. It's insulting to think they expect customers to be satisfied with this disaster of a meal. I feel completely ripped off. This is unacceptable, and I expect compensation for this poor excuse of an order. Fix your standards or lose loyal customers for good

I ORDERED FROM YOUR STORE AND YOU DONT EVEN PACK OR SEND THE RIGHT ITEMS. ORDERED A SALMON BOWL BUT THE SALMON IS MISSING.

On top if that, the portion is small with only afew pieces of vegetables for each of the choices i had made. Extremely disappointed at the lack of attentiveness.

I was been served by Miss Isay . What I can say is she is very cheerful and helpful . I believe Stuff’D employees should behave this way . With a awesome smile and service . Most of the employees doesn’t give me a happy attitude. They should be more happy and more observant too . Thank god that have Isay at Square 2 . This motivates me to go there and support her .
